description: CodeUChain package versions - one version per language implementation

notes.strategy: Each language maintains its own version independently
notes.releases: Release tags are created per-language: python-v1.0.0, go-v1.0.0, etc
notes.updating: Update the version field when releasing a language
notes.automation: release.sh can read this file for version validation

resolution.issue: Version disconnect between git tags (0.2.0) and published packages (1.0.1-1.1.2)
resolution.method: Option A: Git tags re-created to match published versions
remaining: Update release.sh to push tags with releases
